biotools.summary: fauxcurrence is an R package for simulating multi-species occurrences for null models in species distribution modelling and biogeography. The package generates sets of randomised occurrences (long & lat coordinates) for one or more species with a spatial structure (within- and between-species distances) matching that of an observed set of coordinates. These can be used to define null expectations to test hypotheses in ecology and biogeography.
